title: My Dad is Dying
description:
Donna is distraught over her dad who is suffering the end stages of Parkinson's disease. - Dr. Laura: "Unresolved feelings can live long beyond relationships."

Has grief left you distraught? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
